articles.title: Rise of flesh-eating ulcers in Australia’s Victoria state baffles scientists - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Buruli ulcer first emerged in Australia in the early 1900s, but cases have skyrocketed in recent years. The disease can lead to large open wounds, and if untreated, permanent disfiguration and disability.
